## From Atlantic and Amazonian forests to inselbergs and islands

My fieldwork ranges from Atlantic and Amazonian forests to Cerrado, Caatinga, Amazonian cangas and both continental and coastal inselbergs, where I study how environmental gradients, disturbance and insularity shape plant communities and interactions.
